Name: Guard Pell Jorn
Backstory: An old war veteran who only works morning shifts. Pell spends his off-hours carving small wooden figures and talking to them like they're his comrades from the Hill Wars.

Name: Guard Sila Vren
Backstory: Sila guards the gate at night, alone, claiming it’s 'when the moor speaks.' She’s poetic, eerie, and unnerves even other guards. Some say she can hear the dead.

Name: Wanderer Koen Mirth
Backstory: A friendly bard-turned-vagabond who wanders in and out of Karnstadt without explanation. He brings news from afar, but speaks in riddles, and never sleeps in the same place twice.

Name: Wanderer Esra Threnn
Backstory: A herbalist and hedge-witch from the moors. Esra brings rare herbs and mushrooms to trade, and speaks little unless asked about dreams or omens.

Name: Wanderer Jarn the Black
Backstory: A former assassin seeking penance, Jarn avoids violence and helps lost travelers find the road. He wears all black and never enters Karnstadt past dusk.
